titles.title: To provide for demonstration projects for worksite health promotion programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 7/14/1994--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a demonstration project to evaluate the effectiveness of health promotion programs in the worksite and appropriate incentives to encourage employers to adopt such programs. Authorizes appropriations.
